label: W13_WRLD_COMM_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: On the other side of the door
column4: you find yourself in a sand-covered world called the Crowrealm.

label: W13_WRLD_COMM_INITIAL_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Crowrealm is an apocalyptic desert. Just what is going to happen here?

label: W13_WRLD_COMM_INITIAL_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Crowrealm is an apocalyptic desert. What fate awaits you here?

label: W13_LTXT_COMM_HUMANOID_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A massive humanoid robot. Used as a weapon in an ancient war
column4: its days of walking around are clearly over.

label: W13_LTXT_COMM_TWOLEGS_000_DETAIL

label: W13_LTXT_COMM_INDUSTRIAL_000_DETAIL

column4: its days of moving around are clearly over.

label: W13_LTXT_COMM_AIRSHIP_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI

column4: it seems it will never take to them again.

label: W13_LTXT_COMM_WARSHIP_000_DETAIL

column4: it seems it will never sail them again.

label: W13_LTXT_COMM_FERRY_000_DETAIL

label: W13_LTXT_COMM_DIVING_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI

column4: its days of patrolling the abyss are over.
